name: Corporation Pop
description:
We create deeply engaging interactive experiences that connect you with your customers. 
We do this across a range of media and devices – from mobile applications, websites and games to virtual reality experiences and enterprise software.
Our highly experienced team of strategists, designers, developers and project managers combined with our wide range of in-house technical capabilities and strategic insight gives us the breadth of knowledge to ensure that the software we produce always meets the needs of the end-user and is built on the most-appropriate technology.
Together our cross-sector expertise, user-centred design approach, technical capability and agile project management combine to ensure that the projects we deliver are always useable, reliable and provide outstanding value for money.
